item.title: Automatic Dependency Injection in C#: The Complete Guide to Needlr
item.description: Learn how Needlr simplifies dependency injection in C# with automatic service discovery, source generation, and a fluent API for .NET applications. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/02/03/automatic-dependency-injection-in-c-the-complete-guide-to-needlr

item.title: Side Projects and Soft Skills in Interviews - Dev Leader Weekly 125
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss interviews with a focus on side projects and soft skills. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/01/31/side-projects-and-soft-skills-in-interviews-dev-leader-weekly-125

item.title: Weekly Recap - 2026-01-31
item.description: Check out this week from Dev Leader! Here's a list including articles and videos on software engineering, career development, and programming in C#! Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/01/31/weekly-recap-20260131
